title: Lisa Mojsin - The American Accent Course - Say It Correctly x264
description:
Improve your pronunciation and speak English with confidence, clarity and accuracy!

Learn many rules and exceptions which are generally not taught in English classes, including some important differences between British and American English.

Videos include:

-Lists of the most common pronunciation errors of English words
-Pronunciation rules and exceptions
-Commonly confused words
-Pronouncing especially difficult words
-Names of US states that are difficult to pronounce
-British versus American pronunciation
-Syllable stress errors and vowel sound changes

Fix the most common pronunciation errors of English words
